system.description: You become invisible (as the invisibility spell) and at the same time create a major image of yourself that follows the path you choose. The image is under your control. You can make the image move, speak, and gesture. If you cease to concentrate on the image, it continues to carry out the same activity until the spell duration expires. The image cannot make attacks or cast spells. You can see and hear from the image's position. Any spell or effect that targets you affects the image if it is in range; you are not affected so long as you are invisible.
system.savingThrow: None or Will disbelief (if interacted with)
